item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pia coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!     The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_height="yes" equal_height="yes" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1512744092133{padding-right: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1512744061667{background-image: url(http://dev.lincolncollective.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/pray-copy.png?id=2708) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="140px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]

Lincoln Collective

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color="black" align="align_left" border_width="2" el_width="10"][vc_column_text]At Lincoln Collective, we believe in the philosophy of measuring twice and cutting once. We invest heavily in planning and preparation so that we execute flawlessly, and produce work of the highest quality. We fall somewhere between an art collective, a design studio and a creative agency and our services are geared towards working with startups, small businesses and artists. Our young, digitally savvy team is based in Cape Town and we work with a wide range of local and international clients.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="20px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="yes" row_type="row" use_row_as_full_screen_section="no" type="full_width" angled_section="no" text_align="left" background_image_as_pattern="without_pattern" css=".vc_custom_1511256833269{padding-right: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]

Services

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color="black" align="align_left" border_width="2" el_width="10"][vc_column_text]We offer a number of creative services including brand strategy, web design, Wordpress development, photography, graphic design, motion graphics and illustrations. We also sell stock images, illustrations, prints and various digital assets in our online store.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1510859265138{background-image: url(http://dev.lincolncollective.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/sword-copy.png?id=2705) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="140px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Random Thumbnails Without Spaces
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Random Thumbnails With Spaces

Similar to the Random Thumbs Without Spaces (STYLE I). The addition of spaces between adjacent items of the portfolio increases readability and creates a feeling of clarity and order for the visitor.

item.title: 3 Square Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
3 Square Thumbnails Without Spaces

The thumbnails in this template come in groups of three forming a fixed-dimension portfolio. This kind of grid permits the creation of an organized web page which grabs the attention of the visitor. If there are more than three items to be shown, the Load More button at the bottom of the grid reveals another triad of thumbs for the visitor to examine.

item.title: 3 Square Thumbnails + Spaces
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
3 Square Thumbnails With Spaces

Similar to the 3 Square Thumbnails Without Spaces template described above. With the insertion of spaces between neighboring columns, the 3 Square Thumbs + Spaces template offers a more relaxing effect for the visitor.

item.title: 4 Square Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
4 Square Thumbnails Without Spaces

If you have lots of work to demonstrate at once, then this template is for you. A brilliant display of confidence and quantity of work is what you get from presenting your products in groups of four. Of course, the tiny navigation bar appearing at the top of the grid allows quick navigation in the categories of your work or services.

item.title: 4 Square Thumbnails + Spaces
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
4 Square Thumbnails Without Spaces

If you have lots of work to demonstrate at once, then this template is for you. A brilliant display of confidence and quantity of work is what you get from presenting your products in groups of four. Of course, the tiny navigation bar appearing at the top of the grid allows quick navigation in the categories of your work or services.

item.title: Half Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Half Thumbnails Without Spaces

This handy portfolio template shows a grid consisting of two columns. Equipped with the hover effect mentioned above, two columns of half-sized thumbs appear. The thumbnails are displayed in larger dimensions than in the previous templates, hence the name Half Thumbs. The purpose of adopting such a style is to showcase your work using larger images and in greater resolution. Furthermore, you can include more information for each item using the hover effect of the theme. As for the picture quality, Barton is a retina-display ready theme, meaning that the rendering of the pictures is of outstanding quality.

item.title: Half Thumbnail + Spaces
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Half Thumbnails With Spaces

Similar to the previous Half Thumbs template. The addition of spaces between the displayed items, however, enables the visitor to examine each item separately. Choose the Half Thumbs version that suits you best.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_type="row" use_row_as_full_screen_section="no" type="grid" angled_section="no" text_align="center" background_image_as_pattern="without_pattern" css=".vc_custom_1507835464031{padding-top: 89px !important;padding-bottom: 111px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="47px"][vc_single_image image="2655" img_size="100x100" alignment="center" qode_css_animation=""][vc_empty_space height="47px"][vc_column_text]
"Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe."

- Abraham Lincoln

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="47px"][vc_row_inner row_type="row" type="full_width" text_align="left" css_animation=""][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1510928850371{padding-right: 2% !important;padding-left: 2% !important;}"]

At Lincoln Collective, sharpening the axe is at the core of everything we do: in order to succeed at anything, you need to prepare. We spend time and energy on planning so that when we step up to the trunk and take our first swing, we know well cut clean.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="47px"][vc_single_image image="2675" img_size="large" alignment="center" style="vc_box_shadow_3d" qode_css_animation=""][vc_empty_space height="47px"][vc_row_inner row_type="row" type="full_width" text_align="left" css_animation=""][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Agency

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="47px"][vc_column_text]

Lincoln Collective is an integrated creative agency, run by a small group of digital nomads. We offer a variety of services including illustration, photography, web and graphic design, front-end development and brand strategy.The agency is based in Cape Town, South Africa but we have worked with clients from all over the world.Our focus is on offering branding solutions to start-ups and helping the small business sector to grow. Lincoln Collective is rooted in the creative community and aims to support other creatives in theindustry and give back when possible.

Our focus is on offering branding solutions to start-ups and helping the small business sector to grow. Lincoln Collective is rooted in the creative community and aims to support other creatives in theindustry and give back when possible.We also sellstock images, illustrations, prints and various digital assets. These products can be purchased from our online store.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="row" use_row_as_full_screen_section="no" type="full_width" angled_section="no" text_align="left" background_image_as_pattern="without_pattern"][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="47px"][layerslider_vc id="1"][vc_empty_space height="47px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" equal_height="yes" row_type="row" use_row_as_full_screen_section="no" type="full_width" angled_section="no" text_align="left" background_image_as_pattern="without_pattern"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1509300035134{padding-top: 220px !important;padding-bottom: 220px !important;background-image: url(http://lincolncollective.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/handshake-2.jpg?id=888) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_row_inner row_type="row" type="full_width" text_align="left" css_animation="" css=".vc_custom_1509300762191{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"][vc_column_inner css=".vc_custom_1509305034165{padding-right: 6% !important;padding-left: 6% !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1509300652061{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

The Team

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Lincoln Collective is an integrated creative agency, design studio and art collective run by a two young and dedicated digital nomads. Though we each have unique skill sets, they combine in an intense focus on the profession of building brands and businesses.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" row_type="row" use_row_as_full_screen_section="no" type="full_width" angled_section="no" text_align="left" background_image_as_pattern="without_pattern" full_screen_row_position="middle" bg_color="#ffffff" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" overlay_strength="0.3" css=".vc_custom_1510930595548{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" column_padding="padding-10-percent" column_padding_position="all" background_color="#f4f4f4" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" css=".vc_custom_1507022576860{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_row_inner row_type="row" type="full_width" text_align="left" css_animation="" column_margin="default" css=".vc_custom_1507665786669{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}"][vc_column_inner enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" css=".vc_custom_1507022856251{padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="70px"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1507668321463{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

Mario Nobrega

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]is our resident creative genius. With a degree in Visual Communications from Vega and a higher certificate in Web Publishing and Interactive Media, he works as an art director and freelance illustrator, photographer, graphic and web designer. He was part of Design Indabas Emerging Creatives class of 2017 and his blend of dark, tattoo-influenced illustrations, photography and clean design has been featured on Culture Trip.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" Dominique Nobrega

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]is the strategy brain behind our success. With his honours in Strategic Brand Communications from Vega, he is a passionate photographer focusing on minimalism and sweeping landscapes. When he isnt working behind the lens, he is bolted to his desk developing intelligent and effective strategies for brands.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective

item.title: PRIVACY POLICY
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
SECTION 1 WHAT DO WE DO WITH YOUR INFORMATION? When you purchase something from our online store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as:
  • Name and Surname
  • Delivery Address
  • Email Address
  • Telephone Number
  • Mobile Number
  • Date of Birth
  • Gender
When you browse our store, we also automatically receive your computers internet protocol (IP) address in order to provide us with information that helps us learn about your browser and operating system. With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates.   SECTION 2 CONSENT   How do you get my consent? When you provide us with personal information to complete a transaction, verify your credit card, place an order, arrange for a delivery or return a purchase, we imply that you consent to our collecting it and using it for that specific reason only. The Personal Information we collect from you will be used in some or all of the following ways:
  • To identify you
  • To deliver the products you have purchased from LINCOLN COLLECTIVE
  • To update you on the delivery of the product and for customer support purposes
  • To provide you with relevant product information
If we ask for your personal information for a secondary reason, like marketing, we will either ask you directly for your expressed consent or provide you with an opportunity to say no. How do you withdraw your consent? If after you opt-in, you change your mind, you may withdraw your consent for us to contact you, for the continued collection, use or disclosure of your information, at any time, by contacting us atinfo@lincolncollective.com.   SECTION 3 DISCLOSURE   3.1 We will not share your information with any other organisations other than related companies and those third parties directly related to the delivery of the products you have purchased from LINCOLN COLLECTIVEs website. 3.2 In exceptional circumstances LINCOLN COLLECTIVE may be required to disclose Personal Information, such as when there are grounds to believe that the disclosure is necessary to prevent a threat to life or health, or for law enforcement purposes. 3.3 LINCOLN COLLECTIVE is committed to complying with theProtection of Personal Information Act 4 of 2013as well as thePromotion of Access to Information Act 2 of 2000and its principles. 3.4 If you believe that your privacy has been breached by LINCOLN COLLECTIVE please contact our Information Officer atinfo@lincolncollective.comand we will resolve the issue.   SECTION 4 WOOCOMMERCE   Our store is run on the Woocommerce and WordPress. They provide us with the online e-commerce platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you. Payment: If you choose a direct payment gateway to complete your purchase, then Woocommerce stores your credit card data. It is encrypted through the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS). Your purchase transaction data is stored only as long as is necessary to complete your purchase transaction. After that is complete, your purchase transaction information is deleted. All direct payment gateways adhere to the standards set by PCI-DSS as managed by the PCI Security Standards Council, which is a joint effort of brands like Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. PCI-DSS requirements help ensure the secure handling of credit card information by our store and its service providers.   SECTION 5 THIRD-PARTY SERVICES   In general, the third-party providers used by us will only collect, use and disclose your information to the extent necessary to allow them to perform the services they provide to us. However, certain third-party service providers, such as payment gateways and other payment transaction processors, have their own privacy policies in respect to the information we are required to provide to them for your purchase-related transactions. For these providers, we recommend that you read their privacy policies so you can understand the manner in which your personal information will be handled by these providers. In particular, remember that certain providers may be located in or have facilities that are located in a different jurisdiction than either you or us. So if you elect to proceed with a transaction that involves the services of a third-party service provider, then your information may become subject to the laws of the jurisdiction(s) in which that service provider or its facilities are located. As an example, if you are located in Canada and your transaction is processed by a payment gateway located in the United States, then your personal information used in completing that transaction may be subject to disclosure under United States legislation, including the Patriot Act. Once you leave our stores website or are redirected to a third-party website or application, you are no longer governed by this Privacy Policy or our websites Terms of Service. Links When you click on links on our store, they may direct you away from our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites and encourage you to read their privacy statements.   SECTION 6 SECURITY   Lincoln Collective ensures that all information collected will be safely and securely stored. We protect your Personal Information by:
  • Restricting access to personal information
  • Maintaining technology products to prevent unauthorised computer access
  • Securely destroying your personal information when its no longer needed for our record retention purposes
If you provide us with your credit card information, the information is encrypted using secure socket layer technology (SSL) and stored with an AES-256 encryption. Although no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, we follow all PCI-DSS requirements and implement additional generally accepted industry standards.   SECTION 7 AGE OF CONSENT   By using this site, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.   SECTION 8 CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY   We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it. If our store is acquired or merged with another company, your information may be transferred to the new owners so that we may continue to sell products to you.   SECTION 9- CONTACT   If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, register a complaint, or simply want more information contact us atinfo@lincolncollective.com

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

item.title: Wine Bottle
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Wine Bottle

Curabitur vestibulum aliquam leo. Phasellus viverra nulla ut metus varius laoreet. Maecenas ullamcorper, dui et placerat feugiat, eros pede varius nisi, condimentum viverra felis nunc et lorem. Phasellus ullamcorper ipsum rutrum nunc. Ut tincidunt tincidunt erat. Curabitur at lacus ac velit ornare lobortis.. In ut quam vitae odio lacinia tincidunt. Praesent ac massa at ligula laoreet iaculis. Phasellus ullamcorper ipsum rutrum nunc.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
CLIENT:
Some Freelancer

WEBSITE:
http://www.google.com

item.title: Poison City Website
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Poison City Website

 
 
Basic HTML, CSS and Javascript Website   This is a project done for a college project and is not associated with the company. The idea was to take the existing website content and put it into a more modern and minimalist layout while staying true to the brand. There is a light grain texture used throughout the website and there is also element of the packaging incorporated into the website such as the skewed lines.
[layerslider id="2"]    

View Website

item.title: Showreel
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
2017 Showreel

 
 
Animation   This is a fun personal project, I took a few of bits and piece from the year and made them into a showreel.
[videojs_video url="http://dev.lincolncollective.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/Showreel2017MarioNobrega.mp4"]

item.title: Mr Robot Interactive Site
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Mr Robot Interactive Site

 
 
Front End Web Development   This is a fun personal project, I took my one of my favourite series and developed an interactive site for promotional purposes.
[layerslider id="9"]    

View Website

item.title: Mat Curzon Tattoo
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Mat Cruzon Tattoo Website

 
 
Wordpress Development   This is a fun personal project, I took my favourite artist, Mat Curzon and created a website for them. The website includes a portfolio and e-commerce platform for selling products such as shirts. This particular e-commerce store is in working order and all code to work.
[layerslider id="5"]    

View Website

item.title: Poison City Brewing
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Poison City Website

 
 
Illustration and design   This is a collection of the illustrations, that I have done for the Poison City Brewing brand.
[layerslider id="6"]

item.title: Tryptamine
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Tryptamine

 
 
Illustration   The Deconstruction of reality is a project that explores the use of mind-altering substances and how they affect the artist & the artwork. The work is based on quotes from Salvador Dali and these are:   - I don't do drugs. I am drugs. - Take me, I am the drug; take me, I am hallucinogenic.   The magazine uses 3D Anaglyphs to create a drug-like effect but can be viewed with or without the use of 3D Anaglyph glasses.
[layerslider id="7"]    

View Website

;

item.title: Local Travel
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Local Travel

 
 
Photography   This is a collection of photos from my travels around South Africa. All of these photos are available for purchase on the online store.
[layerslider id="8"]

item.title: Into Darkness
item.dc:creator: lincolncollective
item.content:encoded:
Into Darkness

 
 
Into the darkness is a project exploring the concept of with darkness comes light, the idea was to create images using limited light to portray the darkness with little artificial light. This light symbolised the good that will come after the bad times. Smoking is used as a symbol of injustice, pain, adversities and depression. Once the smoke has cleared, there is nothing but light left (This is the light that comes after the darkness) The motions of smoking have been reversed to symbolise the perception of the bad times never ending.  
[layerslider id="3"]

item.content:encoded:
Submerged

 
  A collection of photographs from a shoot, with the theme Submerged. The photography was done by Lincoln Collective and art direction by Cayleen Lockey.
